body:
Hi my friend

Im Mojde

I have one question in ladybug

I want to do interior analysis and I do a little problem.

I dont know that I can defined material in it or not? because all of the wall get the same color that I think it is not true.



I attach the file in here.

Im so glad if you can help me.



thank you

Best

Mojde

replies.body:
Mojde,

You need to be more specific about your study. What are you exactly trying to do. Interior daylight analysis?

Ladybug should not be used for interior analysis as it doesn't reflections. You should use Honeybee instead. There are quite number of examples for Honeybee daylight analysis including [these Hydras](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/?keywords=daylighting).

Mostapha
